meanings.definition: Having or requiring a moderate level of skill or training.
meanings.sent1: The semiskilled worker was able to complete the task with some training.
meanings.sent2: The company hired semiskilled employees to handle basic tasks.
meanings.sent3: The semiskilled chef accidentally added too much salt to the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her semiskilled painting resembled a masterpiece to the untrained eye.
meanings.sent5: The semiskilled mechanic fixed the car with ease.

meanings.definition: A person who possesses a moderate level of skill or training.
meanings.sent1: The semiskilled worker quickly adapted to the new machinery.
meanings.sent2: Semiskilled workers are essential for the smooth operation of the factory.
meanings.sent3: The semiskilled musician played the wrong note during the concert.
meanings.sent4: She proved to be a semiskilled negotiator in the business deal.
meanings.sent5: The semiskilled carpenter crafted a sturdy table.
